price: 83. Nabii Ibraahim isi Rabbi kallacak:yi-Rabbow tu-xiqta ixxiga yoh acuyaay, ku naqoosak meqe mara yoo eleelis iyye.
arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥuk'man wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
